text: مَثَلُهُمۡ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِي ٱسۡتَوۡقَدَ نَارٗا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتۡ مَا حَوۡلَهُۥ ذَهَبَ ٱللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمۡ وَتَرَكَهُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتٖ لَّا يُبۡصِرُونَ

translation.en: Their example is that of one who kindled a fire, but when it illuminated what was around him, Allah took away their light and left them in darkness [so] they could not see
translation.id: Perumpamaan mereka seperti orang-orang yang menyalakan api, setelah menerangi sekelilingnya, Allah melenyapkan cahaya (yang menyinari) mereka dan membiarkan mereka dalam kegelapan, tidak dapat melihat
